root.name: Dracula - Undead Awakening
root.description: In iDracula you play as a vampire hunter that has become the hunted. Hoards of vampires, werewolves and witches swarm at the player, who's aim is to merely survive.Â It uses a 2D isometric viewpoint.Gameplay iDracula is a dual joystick shooter on the iphone. Since the iphone has no analogue sticks, circular objects are in the bottom corners of the iPhones touch screen to be used for this purpose. The player uses the left one to move, and the right one to shoot. At the botom of the screen in the center are the weapons, which can be scrolled though by using the touch screen.The player must shoot hoards of enemys and avoid being attacked by them. Enemies will drop weapons and health for the player to collect. WeaponsThere are several weapons in the game:Hand GunRifleCrossbowGrenade LauncherMachine GunBFG
